data.name: The Last Cove
data.detailed_description:
The world ended and humanity was being forced into extinction. The Last Cove is a first person explorative tale of a father and daughter both clinging to life in their final enclave. Go on a unique journey collecting memories with each character as they remember their past and try to survive.

Key Features:

  • For fans of Myst, The First Tree and Firewatch.
  • Gripping, emotional story about life at the end of the world.
  • A short game focused on story with some puzzle-lite gameplay.
data.about_the_game:

Key Features:

  • Gripping, emotional story about life at the end of the world.

data.short_description: A gripping, explorative tale of a father and daughter both desperately clinging to life in their final enclave. The father trying to find his daughter one last time, while she moves further from his grasp. Join them on a journey within The Last Cove.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and newer
  • Processor: 2.4GHz CPU Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 900 series / Radeon R7 300 series with 1GB Memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
